entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is Lucius's wife and she is concerned about summoning the Dark Lord without being certain it is Harry Potter. She mentions that if they are mistaken, the Dark Lord will be angry.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is Narcissa's husband and he is also concerned about summoning the Dark Lord without being certain it is Harry Potter.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a Snatcher who is forcing the prisoners to swivel around so that the light falls on Hermione.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one they are trying to confirm as the Dark Lord's target. They have a blackthorn wand that may or may not be his.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a prisoner who is being forced to swivel around so that the light falls on her. Narcissa recognizes her from a picture in the Prophet.

entities.name: madam malkin
entities.description: Madam Malkin's is a business where Hermione and Harry bought their school robes.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is Lucius and Narcissa's son. He is unsure if the blackthorn wand belongs to Harry Potter or not.

entities.name: rowle
entities.description: Rowle is someone who was punished by the Dark Lord for being mistaken.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is someone who was punished by the Dark Lord for being mistaken.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a powerful wizard who is feared by many. He will be summoned if they are certain it is Harry Potter.

entities.name: olivander
entities.description: Ollivander's is a business that sells wands.
